title: Nuxt 4 + Nuxt UI 4 Upgrade
description:
Upgrade nuxt-supabase-team-auth module to support Nuxt 4 and Nuxt UI 4, while maintaining backward compatibility for consumers on Nuxt 3 + UI 3.

## Context
- Current: Nuxt 3.13.0+, Nuxt UI 3.0.0+
- Target: Nuxt 4.x, Nuxt UI 4.x
- Nuxt 3 EOL: July 31, 2026
- Nuxt UI 4 requires Nuxt 4

## Strategy
Dual major version approach:
- v0.x branch: Nuxt 3 + UI 3 (maintenance)
- v1.x branch: Nuxt 4 + UI 4 (active development)

## Key Dependencies
- @nuxt/kit: 3.17.6 → 4.3.0
- @nuxtjs/supabase: 1.5.3 → 2.0.3
- @nuxt/devtools: 1.7.0 → 3.1.1
